thread.title: Halal Expo 2017 in Sydney opens | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Halal Expo 2017 in Sydney opens | Daily Mail Online

author: Sinead Maclaughlin For Daily Mail Australia
title: Halal Expo 2017 in Sydney opens | Daily Mail Online
text: Islamic prayer mats, food stalls and 'sin free Camel Balls' bubblegum: Halal Expo celebrating Muslim practices opens in Sydney - but 45C heat keeps the crowds away Sydney's Halal Expo was held at Rosehill Gardens Racecourse on Saturday Stalls boasting camel's milk, prayer mats and even bidets lined the walls Crowds were slow to form as NSW's severe heatwave sent temperatures soaring Pictures show a rather cheeky side to the expo, with a stall offer 'camel ball' gum Two day event featured controversial Islamic preacher Sheikh Shady Alsuleiman Published: 08:55 GMT, 11 February 2017 | Updated: 08:55 GMT, 11 February 2017 46 shares
